item.title: Brew使用
item.description: Mac 下brew 安装更新报错 git -C /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core fetch --unshallow git -C /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask fetch --unshallow fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/': LibreSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection to github.com:443 fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/': LibreSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection to github.com:443 解决办法 git config --global --unset http.proxy git -C /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core fetch --unshallow git -C /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask fetch --unshallow 查看git 配置 git config --global --list
